meanings.definition: The state or quality of being sultry.
meanings.sent1: The sultriness of the room made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent2: The sultriness of the summer day made everyone seek shade.
meanings.sent3: The sultriness of the tropical island made the tourists feel like they were in a sauna.
meanings.sent4: The sultriness of the atmosphere enveloped us like a heavy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The sultriness of the desert sun was unbearable.

meanings.definition: A sultry or oppressively hot condition.
meanings.sent1: The sultriness of the city in summer was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: We couldn't escape the sultriness of the greenhouse.
meanings.sent3: The sultriness of the sauna made it feel like a steam room.
meanings.sent4: The sultriness of the oven when baking bread was intense.
meanings.sent5: The sultriness of the attic in midday was stifling.
